name: Unbxd
overview:
Unbxd is a young technology startup which helps online visitors on an E-Commerce website fond the right product through a powerful yet humane search and retailers to convert these visitors into customers.

Unbxd has built a new age search system which is ‘almost human’. It not only helps other humans who visit, it also learns from their visits and gets smarter by the visit. However unlike most humans, it shares such intelligence with the owner of the site giving deep insight into who visited the site, what kind of people, what kind of products did they like, etc. This is probably why it is only ‘almost human’.

By having Unbxd Search on your website, you not only provide a human experience for visitors, but also get an opportunity to promote custom products to the right audience. Say users land on your site and search for laptops, you promote the latest Sony Viao. If they search for music and is a 16 year old teenager, you promote Justin Bieber’s latest single. Quite literally, users are presented with advertisements depending on who they are and what they want.
